General.Name: Gopeng Bhd
General.Description: Gopeng Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the cultivation of oil palm and property development activities in Malaysia. It operates through Property Development, Plantation, and Others segments. The company also develops residential and commercial properties; constructs power plants; and cultivates pineapple. Its oil palm plantation area covers an area of approximately 1,260 hectares located in Gopeng, Perak, Malaysia. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
